toc_entry.title: Dining Out Is Fun!
toc_entry.description: If mother doesn’t make food like she used to, there are still a few great cafes in Texas that will.

toc_entry.title: The Man Who Dreamed Up Luckenbach
toc_entry.description: Hondo Crouch went from being a champion athlete to being the sad clown of Texas’ fun-and-games capital.

toc_entry.title: The Blue Law
toc_entry.subtitle: Texas Primer
toc_entry.description: On Sunday it is legal to buy beer but not baby bottles, screws but not screwdrivers, disposable diapers but not cloth ones. No place but Texas.

toc_entry.title: Mrs. De Menil’s Eye
toc_entry.description: When Dominique de Menil organized the Paris premiere of her legendary art collection, she must have blinked.

toc_entry.title: The Man In the Black Hat, Part Two
toc_entry.description: With the help of a friendly banker and some friendlier politicians, Clinton Manges conquered mighty Mobil Oil and saved his empire. But not for long—it’s in jeopardy again.

toc_entry.title: Take This Job And Love It
toc_entry.description: Sandi Barton works from 8:30 to 5 as a secretary in a downtown Dallas office. She knows a lot of women look down on her job, but it suits her just fine.

toc_entry.title: Cat Dog Man
toc_entry.subtitle: Western Art
toc_entry.description: An interpretation of a classic genre.

toc_entry.title: Temple Of Excess
toc_entry.subtitle: Movies
toc_entry.description: Indiana Jones bashes us with unthinking cruelty; The Natural is a balk; Sixteen Candles is lit up with tickling teenage talk.

toc_entry.title: A Byte Of Life
toc_entry.subtitle: Software
toc_entry.description: The Flight Simulator and Heroism in the Modern Age are realistic new computer games that offer a wonderful mix of fantasy and reality; Free Enterprise is too simplistic to be much fun.

toc_entry.title: Getting Mellow
toc_entry.subtitle: Jazz
toc_entry.description: In the sixties the free-jazz movement produced music that was defiantly experimental, and the same artists are still playing some of the most stimulating jazz around.

toc_entry.title: The Roar Of the Crowd
toc_entry.description: Austin’s ins and outs, Lamaze’s pros and cons, the sun’s ups and downs.

toc_entry.title: Around the State
toc_entry.description: A selective statewide guide to amusements and events. Suzanne Winckler

toc_entry.title: Reporter
toc_entry.description: A meditation on the radioactive peril in Juarez; a trip to the World’s Fair in New Orleans; a search for the biggest tree in Texas; a look at the state’s biggest rock ’n' roll promoters.

toc_entry.title: State Secrets
toc_entry.description: Presenting the Big Bend Condos and Solitario Safari; Mexico finds out what it feels like to have an immigrant problem; Oscar Wyatt and Clinton Manges gird for battle; inside report from the special session.
